text: CIZZ-FM is a radio station in Red Deer, Alberta. Owned by Stingray Group, it broadcasts a classic rock format. As CKRD-FM, the station was a network affiliate of CBC Stereo from 1977 to 1981.http://www.broadcasting- history.ca/listing_and_histories/radio/cizz-fm ==References== == External links == * * * IZZ IZZ IZZ Category:Radio stations established in 1965 Category:1965 establishments in Alberta Category:Former Corus Entertainment subsidiaries
title: CIZZ-FM
